column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The food was Amazing!! The bacon tomato watercress salad was delicious
column2: the bacon melts In your mouth
column3: my duchess steak was cooked to medium rare perfection
column4: the sweet potato and Brussels sprouts sides were delicious.  Classic cocktails and classic vibe.  The star of the night was our server Brandon. He is hands down the best server I have ever had!! He was attentive
column6: kind and every other positive descriptive word.
